sys_relationship.name: Approvals

sys_update_version.name: sys_relationship_29e900da83823a9078c11a30ceaad32f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>x_1850706_govsma_0_government_service_ticket</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>sysapproval_approver</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Approvals</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[// get assignment group from parent record


// get managers in the same group
var managers = [];
var grMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
grMember.addQuery('group', parent.assignment_group);
grMember.query();

while (grMember.next()) {
    if (grMember.user.manager) {
        managers.push(grMember.user.manager.toString());
    }
}

// avoid empty IN query
if (managers.length > 0) {
    current.addQuery('approver', 'IN', managers.join(','));
} else {
    current.addQuery('sys_id', 'NULL'); // return no records
}]]></query_with><reference_field>approver</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-28 03:37:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>29e900da83823a9078c11a30ceaad32f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Approvals</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System" source="x_1850706_govsma_0">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GovSmart Review &amp; Visit Management System">e0e99de183fdf21078c11a30ceaad3e5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_29e900da83823a9078c11a30ceaad32f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-30 01:53:06</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=29e900da83823a9078c11a30ceaad32f"/></record_update>
